front.title: •Lieutenant Lepira
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. When piloting Gold 4 during battle, adds one destiny to total power only. When at Anoat system, adds 1 to each of your Force drains there.
front.lore: Piloted Gold 4 at the Battle of Yavin. Learned to fly a starfighter by racing through the Anoat system.
